DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to do a follow-up survey of all individuals with hereditary hypophosphatemia in Norway, focusing on manifestations in childhood and adolescence. The investigators also want to study phenotype-genotype associations, and look for new genes, in all forms of hereditary hypo and hyperphosphatemia.
DOC.criteria: All patients in the Norwegian population with hereditary hypophosphatemia, with or without rickets Patients in the Norwegian population with hereditary hyperphosphatemia
